title: How I'm Building A $100/Hour Code-Coaching Business FAST (GoDaddy - Not Just Domain Names!)

cleanText:
Hey everyone.
In this video, I want to talk about starting a small business and what you need to set up online to get started.
So, I know a lot of you are starting small businesses, whether it's some kind of software consulting business or a web design business, maybe you're selling themes.
